articles.title: Elon Musk Becomes First To $300 Billion, Worth More Than Ford, GM & Volkswagen Combined - carandbike
articles.description: Musk's value majorly comes from his shares in Tesla but also SpaceX which is the rocket company that he founded.
articles.content: Elon Musk has become the first human to be worth more than $300 billion. His fortune surged by over $10 billion in one day after Tesla became the first automaker to be valued over a trillion dollars.… [+1892 chars]

articles.author: RT
articles.title: New king on the block: Microsoft beats Apple as world's most valuable company - RT
articles.description: Apple has lost its crown as the globe’s most valuable public company to Microsoft this week after the iPhone-making giant’s shares dropped 2%.
articles.content: Apple's shares fell 1.8% on Friday, ending the trading session at $149.80 apiece. The company’s market capitalization dropped to $2.48 trillion. Microsoft shares, however, showed 2.2% gains, reaching… [+1954 chars]

articles.title: Will the person who attacked an American Airlines flight attendant be charged? - FOX 31 Denver
articles.description: The American Airlines flight attendant attacked by a passenger mid-flight is back home after a short stay at a Denver hospital, but the person who attacked her has not been charged.
articles.content:
